channel.title: RenuxCraft ~ Hardcore Faction Pvp!
channel.description:
[center][b][b][size=18pt]Server IP: 204.93.166.73[/size][/b] PLEASE JOIN :) ReuxCraft! Hardcore Faction PvP server! General Info: Come now as We are a brand new server! This is a server were you make allies and enemies! Try to become the strongest Faction out there! Raid others! BE THE BEST! Server Info: We have friendly and professional staff. There are certain criteria you must have before you can become a staff member.
In total we currently have 28 plugins, still ALOT more to be added! If you have a suggestion let us know so we can make your stay more comftorable!
We have multiple different ranks. When you first join, you're a "Guest". If you're active and follow the rules you quickly become a "Member", who has more rights and can do more. If you also help people with questions, there is no doubt that you will become a "Veteran" fast. Only people who are "Veteran" have the possibility to become staff.
Joining us will give you a lot of pleasure for sure! We will become a close community where everybody has fun. Players can create amazing bases, as far as 30K blocks away from spawn. We have the FactionsPlus Plugin! This extra plugin gives the opportunity to create Warps inside your faction territory. This is like a second home! you can also jail people, announce things or ban inside your own faction. You can color you signs as well to make cool messages! AND MUCH MUCH MORE! Awesome fighting zones!
Become the strongest, become the best! Rule over the wilderness of RenuxCraft!
If you would like to donate to us for amazing extra benefits there are three offered donator ranks with amazing things such as daimond kits!
Iron - $10 Benefits: /kit iron every 24 hours you can use this to get 10 daimonds and daimond armour! you can also set 4 homes! Get access to the CREATIVE WORLD! :) get $5000 ingame!
Gold - $25 get /kit gold which gives you 25 daimonds every 24 hours along with daimond armour and tools! Get to set 8 Homes! GET ACCESS TO THE CREATIVE WORLD! :) ability to spawn mob eggs! get $10000 ingame!
Daimond - $40 get /kit daimond which gives you 30 daimonds every 12 hours! get 12 homes! get access to the creative world! get 3 free level 50 enchants! Access to daimond Donator Faction BASE! Its it's own special base far out! ability to spawn mob eggs!
Read more about donator info at spawn.[/b][/center]

item.title: RenuxCraft ~ Hardcore Faction Pvp!
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[center][b][size=18pt]Server IP: 204.93.166.73[/size]
PLEASE JOIN
ReuxCraft! Hardcore Faction PvP server!
General Info:
Come now as We are a brand new server! This is a server were you make allies and enemies! Try to become the strongest Faction out there! Raid others! BE THE BEST!
Server Info:
We have friendly and professional staff. There are certain criteria you must have before you can become a staff member.

In total we currently have 28 plugins, still ALOT more to be added! If you have a suggestion let us know so we can make your stay more comftorable!

We have multiple different ranks.
When you first join, you’re a “Guest”. If you’re active and follow the rules you quickly become a “Member”, who has more rights and can do more. If you also help people with questions, there is no doubt that you will become a “Veteran” fast. Only people who are “Veteran” have the possibility to become staff.

Joining us will give you a lot of pleasure for sure! We will become a close community where everybody has fun.
Players can create amazing bases, as far as 30K blocks away from spawn. We have the FactionsPlus Plugin!
This extra plugin gives the opportunity to create Warps inside your faction territory. This is like a second home! you can also jail people, announce things or ban inside your own faction. You can color you signs as well to make cool messages! AND MUCH MUCH MORE! Awesome fighting zones!

Become the strongest, become the best! Rule over the wilderness of RenuxCraft!

If you would like to donate to us for amazing extra benefits there are three offered donator ranks with amazing things such as daimond kits!

Iron - $10
Benefits:
/kit iron
every 24 hours you can use this to get 10 daimonds and daimond armour!
you can also set 4 homes!
Get access to the CREATIVE WORLD!
get $5000 ingame!

Gold - $25
get /kit gold which gives you 25 daimonds every 24 hours along with daimond armour and tools!
Get to set 8 Homes!
GET ACCESS TO THE CREATIVE WORLD!
ability to spawn mob eggs!
get $10000 ingame!

Daimond - $40
get /kit daimond which gives you 30 daimonds every 12 hours!
get 12 homes!
get access to the creative world!
get 3 free level 50 enchants!
Access to daimond Donator Faction BASE! Its it’s own special base far out!
ability to spawn mob eggs!

Read more about donator info at spawn.[/b][/center]
